message: Successfully deployed. getArtistById() now returns genres. Apple Music/Spotify imports will now include genres.
follow_up_needed: Re-import from Apple Music or Spotify to get genres on new favorites
Existing favorites without genres will be enriched when clicked
deployed_features: getArtistById() function for full artist data with genres
Apple Music import fetches genres after search match
Spotify import fetches genres after search match
Background sync updated for both services
notes: Genre-at-import fix deployed. Users need to re-import to get genres on new artists.
